title: Cant create a new account?
body: So, I found a name that is available but I can't click yes to create the account. When pressed nothing happens... I can on the other hand press no?

replies.body: I'm having this problem as well however I'm using valid emails and it continues to tell me its not a valid email....
Are you sure you're also entering a *different email* that isn't currently tied to a League account? If not, try that change and let me know if the page works correctly.
